page.shortlink: api star plain to html function
page.description: Convert from plain text to html.

argument.name: HTML_Text
argument.description: HTML encoded text with default font, style, and size attributes.

page.discussion: The *PLAIN_TO_HTML() function converts plain ASCII text into HTML text.
page.example: dim html_text as C dim plain_text as C plain_text = "George lived on top of a mountain." html_text = *plain_to_html(plain_text) ? html_text =
